nodes.text: U5-GG, also known as Gigi, was a U5 astromech droid who served the Resistance. Gigi was assigned to the spy Vi Moradi. The two were captured in a starhopper by the First Order, and Moradi wiped U5-GG's memory before stormtroopers could access any data. The stormtroopers were subsequently ordered to haul off the droid for parts.
